## ManagedRemirrorProvider variable

Renders the content while pulling the manager from the context and passing it on to the RemirrorProvider.

If no manager exists the child components are not rendered.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ManagedRemirrorProvider: {
    <GExtension extends import("@remirror/core").Extension<any, any> = any>({ children, ...props }: ManagedRemirrorProviderProps<GExtension>): JSX.Element | null;
    $$remirrorType: RemirrorType;
}
```
